title: Tahajjud Salaat
subtitle: Salaatul Layl (Night Prayer)
description:
Salaatul Layl consists of 11 rakats

The first 8 in pairs of 2, each with the niyyah of 'Nawafilatul-Layl'

The next 2 with the niyyah of 'Salaatul Shif'a'

And the remaining 1 with the niyyah of 'Salaatul Witr'

sections.description: In Salaatul Witr, recite the following surahs:
In the qunoot of Salaatul Witr, recite the following du'a:

body.text: لآ اِلَهَ اِلاَّ اللّهُ الْحَلِيْمُ الْكَرِيْمُ
body.transliteration: LAA ILAAHA ILLALLAAHUL HALIMUL KARIM
body.translation: There is none worth worshipping but Allah Who is Forbearing and Generous

body.text: لآ اِلَهَ اِلاَّ اللّهُ الْعَلِيُّ الْعَظِيْمُ
body.transliteration: LAA ILAAHA ILLALLAAHUL ‘ALIYYUL ‘AZIM
body.translation: There is none worth worshipping but Allah Who is Most High and Great

body.transliteration: SUBHAANALLAAHI RABBIS SAMAAWAATIS SAB'
body.translation: Glory be to Allah, Who is the Sustainer of the seven heavens and of the seven earth

body.transliteration: WA RABBIL ‘ARZINAS SAB'
body.translation: And Who is the Sustainer of all the things

body.text: و مَا فِيْهِنَّ وَ مَا بَيْنَهُنَّ وَ
body.transliteration: WA MAA FIHINNA WA MAA BAYNAHUNNA
body.translation: in them, and between them,

body.transliteration: WA RABBUL 'ARSHIL ‘AZIM
body.translation: And Who is the Lord of the great ‘Arsh (Divine Center of Authority & Power)

body.transliteration: WAL HAMDUL LILLAAHI RABBIL 'AALAMIN
body.translation: And all praise for Allah, the Sustainer of the worlds.

sections.description: After Salaatul Witr, recite the following istighfar 70 times

body.text: اَسْتَغْفِرُ اللّهَ رَبِّي وَ اَتُوْبُ اِلَيْهِ
body.transliteration: ASTAGHFIRULLAAH RABBI WA ATUUBU ILAYH
body.translation: I seek forgiveness of Allah my Lord and I turn to Him

body.transliteration: AL-'AFWA
body.translation: (I ask for) forgiveness

title: Amaal e Ashura
subtitle: Day of 10th Muharram
description:
The day of Ashura is a day of mourning, commemorating Imam Hussain (as) and his companions' martydom.

During this day, focus on the tragedy that took place and avoid business matters, acts of joy and unnecessary discussions.

Also, it is sunnah (recommended) to strike (fast) from Fajr to Asr (late afternoon) as a way of remembering the thirst of the army of Imam Hussain (as).

sections.description: Between Fajr and Zuhr salaah recite the following salaat, which consists of 4 rakats in 2 sets of 2 as follows:

details.heading: In the first rakat of the first salaat, recite Surah Al-Kafirun (109) after Surah Al-Fatihah (1):
In the second rakat of the first salaat, recite Surah Al-Ikhlas (112) after Surah Al-Fatihah (1):
In the first rakat of the second salaat, recite Surah Al-Ahzab (33) or any other surah after Surah Al-Fatihah (1):
In the second rakat of the second salaat, recite Surah Al-Munafiqun (63) or any other surah after Surah Al-Fatihah (1):

sections.description: Take a few steps forward and backward 7 times to remember Imam Hussain (as) carrying his 6 month old baby Ali Asghar back and forth, hesitating to hand him over to his mother

details.heading: Recite the following as you are walking forward:

body.text: اِنَّا لِله وَ اِنَّا اِلَيْهِ رَاجِعُوْنَ
body.transliteration: INNAA LILLAAHI WA INNAA ILAYHI RAAJI-O ‘ON
body.translation: Verily we are Allah’s and verily unto Him we return

details.heading: Recite the following as you are walking backward:

body.transliteration: RIZ’AN BI-QAZ’AAA-IHEEWA TASLEEMAN LI-AMRIH
body.translation: We are happy with His will and carry out His command

sections.description: Before Asr, listen to the maqtal of Imam Hussain (as)
At around the time of Asr, open your strike (fast) as this is around the time when Imam Hussain (as) was martyred and his thirst ceased
In the evening (around the time of Maghrib), listen to Shaam e Ghariban and Salaam e Akhir

body.transliteration: SALAM KHAAK NASHEENO PA SOGWARON KA
body.translation: Salam from the mourners to those lying on the sand

body.transliteration: GHAREEB DETE HAI PURSA TUMHARE PYARO KA
body.translation: The poor offer condolences for your loved ones

body.transliteration: SALAM UN PA JINHE SHARM KHAAYE JAATI HAI
body.translation: Salam to those to whom Salam goes out of shame

body.transliteration: KHULE SARON PE ASEERI KI KHAAK AATI HAI
body.translation: Uncovered heads are showered with the sands of imprisonment

body.transliteration: SALAM US PA JO ZAHMAT KASHE SALAASIL HAI
body.translation: Salam to the one who bears hardships while being chained

body.transliteration: MUSIBATON MAY IMAMAT KI PEHLI MANZIL HAI
body.translation: The first milestone of Imamat lies within hardships

body.transliteration: SALAM BHEJTE HAI APNI SHAHZADI PAR
body.translation: Salam to the Princess (Zainab SA) to whom we pledge allegiance

body.transliteration: KE JISKO SAWNP GAYE MARTE WAQT GHAR SARWAR
body.translation: To whom The King (Hussain AS) handed over the house (of The Prophet SAW)

body.transliteration: MUSAFIRAT NE JISE BEBASI YE DIKHLAYI
body.translation: Her travels have taken everything from her

body.transliteration: NISAR KAR DIYE BACHE NA BACH SAKA BHAI
body.translation: Her children have been sacrificed, nor was her Brother spared

body.transliteration: ASEER HO KE JISE SHAAMIYO KE NARGHAY MAY
body.translation: The lady who was made a prisoner and was cordoned by Damascenes

body.transliteration: HUSAINIYAT HAI SIKHAANA ALI KE LEHJE MAY
body.translation: Ali (AS) taught the character of Hussain (AS) through his way of speaking

body.transliteration: SAKINA BIBI TUMHARE GHULAM HAAZIR HAI
body.translation: Lady Sakina (SA), your servants are here

body.transliteration: BUJHE JO PYAS TO ASHKON KE JAAM HAAZIR HAI
body.translation: We brought you cups of tears for your thirst

body.transliteration: YE SIN, YE HASHR YE SADMAY NAYE NAYE BIBI
body.translation: This age, this doomsday, these calamities are all new

body.transliteration: KAHAN PA BAITHI HO QAIME TO JAL GAYE BIBI
body.translation: I wonder where are you sitting? All the tents have been burnt

body.transliteration: PAHAAR RAAT BARI DER HAI SAWERE MAY
body.translation: The night seems to be mountainous, daybreak is so far away

body.transliteration: KAHAN HO SHAAM-E-GHAREEBAN KE GHUP ANDHERE MAY
body.translation: Where are you in the pitch black darkness of the evening of the exiled and destitute?

body.transliteration: ZAMEEN GARM, YATEEMI KI SAKHTIYAN BIBI
body.translation: The ground is hot (where you are sleeping), these are the hardships of being an orphan

body.transliteration: WO SEENA JIS PA KE SOTI THI AB KAHAN BIBI
body.translation: That chest on which you used to sleep (her dad - Hussain AS) is no more

body.transliteration: JANAAB-E-MAADAR-E-BAYSHEER KO BHI SAB KA SALAM
body.translation: Salam to the esteemed mother (Rubab SA) of the infant (Ali Asghar AS)

body.transliteration: AJEEB WAQT HAI KYA DEIN TASALLIYON KA PAYAM
body.translation: This is a strange time, how can we send comforting messages?

body.transliteration: ABHI KALEJE MAY EK AAG SI LAGI HOGI
body.translation: Right now your liver must be on fire (figuratively)

body.transliteration: ABHI TO GODH KI GARMI NA KAM HUI HOGI
body.translation: The warmth of the cradle must not have cooled yet

body.transliteration: NAHIN ANDHERE MAIN KUCH SOOJHTA KIDHAR DHUNDHEN
body.translation: In the darkness we can’t see anything, where should we search (for your son: Ali Asghar AS)?

body.transliteration: TUMHARA CHAAND KAHAN CHHUP GAYA KIDHAR DHUNDHEN
body.translation: Where is your moon (a term of endearment for an infant child) hiding? Where should we search for him?

body.transliteration: NA IS TARAH KOI KHETI HARI BHARI UJDI
body.translation: Never have any offspring been uprooted like this

body.transliteration: TUMHARI MAANG BHI UJRI HAI GODH BHI UJDI
body.translation: Your marriage has been uprooted and your cradle has been as well

body.transliteration: NAHI LAYEENO MAY INSAAN KOI KHUDA HAFIZ
body.translation: There isn't a single human being amongst the enemies, the enemies deserve to have all of their divine blessings recalled by God, may God keep you The imprisoned family of The Prophet SAW safe

body.transliteration: DARINDE AUR YE BE-WARISI KHUDA HAFIZ
body.translation: You (imprisoned family of The Prophet SAW) are captives of carnivorous wild animals (the enemies) and you don't have enough heirs to protect you, may God keep you (imprisoned family of The Prophet SAW) safe

body.transliteration: SHAREEK-E-HAQ DAROOD-O-SALAM-E-PAYGHAMBAR
body.translation: To those rightfully included in the darood and Salam of the Prophet SAW:

body.transliteration: SALAM SAYYID-E-LAWLAAK KE LUTE GHAR PAR
body.translation: Salam to the looted household of the one for whom the universe was created

body.transliteration: SALAM MOHSIN-E-ISLAM KHASTA TAN LAASHO
body.translation: Salam to the benefactors of Islam, the wound riddled corpses

body.transliteration: SALAM TUM PE SHAEEDON KE BE KAFAN LAASHO
body.translation: Salam to the martyrs lying on the plains of Karbala unburried and without coffins

body.transliteration: SALAM TUM PE RASOOL-O-BATOOL KE PYARO
body.translation: Salam to those who are dear to The Prophet SAW and Bibi Fatima SA

body.transliteration: SALAM MEHR-E-SHAHADAT KE GIRD SAYYARO
body.translation: Salam to the exemplary pinnacles of martyrdom

body.transliteration: BACHE TO AGLE BARAS HAM HAIN AUR YE GHAM PHIR HAI
body.translation: If we remain then next year we will be here to mourn again

body.transliteration: JO CHAL BASE TO YE APNA SALAAM-E-AAKHIR HAI
body.translation: The mourners who will depart between this year and the next, send their final Salam
